title: Symbolic Manipulations - Exp/Log/Trig Functions Part B

content.question: Part B The functions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>j</mi> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>k</mi> </math> are given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>j</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BF0@</annotation> </semantics> </math> <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mi>e</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F2@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (i) Solve <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>j</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadQgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaaGimaaaa@3CDF@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>x</mi> </math> in the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mrow><mo>[</mo> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>]</mo></mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C2D@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (ii) Solve <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>e</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadUgacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH9aqpcaaIZaGaamyzaaaa@3C3C@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>x</mi> </math> in the domain of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>k</mi> </math>.

frqParts.text: Part B The functions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>j</mi> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>k</mi> </math> are given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>j</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BF0@</annotation> </semantics> </math> <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mi>e</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F2@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (i) Solve <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>j</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadQgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaaGimaaaa@3CDF@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>x</mi> </math> in the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mrow><mo>[</mo> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>]</mo></mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C2D@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (ii) Solve <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>e</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadUgacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH9aqpcaaIZaGaamyzaaaa@3C3C@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>x</mi> </math> in the domain of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>k</mi> </math>.

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
